explains: adj. 父权制的，男性主宰统治的；族长的，家长的
wordGroup: patriarchal society [人类学]父权社会；宗法社会

sentences.en: To feminists she is a classic victim of the patriarchal society.
sentences.cn: 在女权主义者眼中，她是父权社会的典型受害者。

sentences.en: Patriarchal culture and institutions constructed them as chaste, silent, obedient, and subordinate.
sentences.cn: 父权文化和制度把她们塑造成贞洁、沉默、顺从和服从的人。

sentences.en: These ethnic- and class-based traditions themselves challenged the legitimacy of patriarchal marriage.
sentences.cn: 这些基于种族和阶级的传统本身就挑战了父权婚姻的合法性。
